generated_body: The article likely reports on a tragic incident involving a Porsche that crashed into the second story of a building in New Jersey, resulting in the deaths of two individuals. Readers can expect details regarding the circumstances of the crash, including the time and location, as well as information about the victims and any potential eyewitness accounts. The article may also explore the aftermath of the incident, such as investigations by local authorities and any statements from officials or witnesses.
